downloadDescription: Provides a sample regular expressions library for SQL Server and Azure SQL Managed Instance
detailsSection: When migrating from another platform to SQL Server, sometimes a blocker for the migration is regular expressions support in SQL Server. This sample library can be used and/or customized to provide the regular expressions support, that you need on with SQL Server or Azure SQL Managed Instance (MI). The library requires that CLR support be turned on.
systemRequirementsSection: This is a zipped folder that contains the C# Visual Studio solution and sample scripts to install and use the library.
installInstructionSection: Choose the Download button on the page to start the Download. Once downloaded, we recommend that you rebuild the library and sign it with your own certificate before installation.
